option.name: originalContent
option.value: apiVersion: apps/v1 kind: Deployment metadata: name: {{ default "postgres-blue" .Values.fullnameOverride }} # namespace intentionally omitted: ArgoCD / Helm will set destination namespace spec: replicas: {{ default 1 .Values.replicaCount }} selector: matchLabels: app: {{ default "postgres-blue" .Values.fullnameOverride }} template: metadata: labels: app: {{ default "postgres-blue" .Values.fullnameOverride }} spec: containers: - name: postgres image: "{{ .Values.image.repository }}:{{ .Values.image.tag }}" imagePullPolicy: {{ default "IfNotPresent" .Values.image.pullPolicy }} ports: - containerPort: {{ default 5432 .Values.service.port }} env: - name: POSTGRES_USER value: "{{ .Values.postgresql.username }}" - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD value: "{{ .Values.postgresql.password }}" - name: POSTGRES_DB value: "{{ .Values.postgresql.database }}" volumeMounts: - name: data mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data volumes: - name: data persistentVolumeClaim: claimName: {{ default "postgres-pvc" .Values.fullnameOverride }}

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: apiVersion: apps/v1 kind: Deployment metadata: name: {{ default "postgres-blue" .Values.fullnameOverride }} # namespace intentionally omitted: ArgoCD / Helm will set destination namespace spec: replicas: {{ default 1 .Values.replicaCount }} selector: matchLabels: app: {{ default "postgres-blue" .Values.fullnameOverride }} template: metadata: labels: app: {{ default "postgres-blue" .Values.fullnameOverride }} spec: containers: - name: postgres image: "{{ .Values.image.repository }}:{{ .Values.image.tag }}" imagePullPolicy: {{ default "IfNotPresent" .Values.image.pullPolicy }} ports: - containerPort: {{ default 5432 .Values.service.port }} env: - name: POSTGRES_USER value: "{{ .Values.postgresql.username }}" - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD value: "{{ .Values.postgresql.password }}" - name: POSTGRES_DB value: "{{ .Values.postgresql.database }}" volumeMounts: - name: data mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data volumes: - name: data persistentVolumeClaim: claimName: {{ default "postgres-pvc" .Values.fullnameOverride }}
